Event.name: Lose_possession
Event.definition: <def-root>Subframe of Transfer in which the <fen>Donor</fen> begins by possessing a <fen>Theme</fen> and finishes by not possessing the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> indicates what the <fen>Donor</fen> is trying to accomplish by the Relinquishing.</def-root>

Arg.name: Donor
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person that begins in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen> and causes it to be in the possession of the <fen>Recipient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Theme</fen> is the object that changes ownership due to the Relinquishing.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Purpose</fen> indicates the purpose for which the intentional Relinquishing takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Recipient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Recipient</fen> is the entity that ends up in possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>
